name: Save The Parachute Troops From Falling Down FREE
name_original: Save The Parachute Troops From Falling Down FREE
description:
Your parachute troops comes out the airplane to complete the landing mission. They're falling down one after one and they can't open the parachute.

Here comes your goal - you have to tap everyone to open his parachute and safe his life. But tap every one only one time - the second tap closes the parachute again.

This is a funny game for the whole family and brings you hours of entertainment.

Features:
-Easy to learn - only tap to open the parachute
-Cute graphics
-Cool sounds and music
-Universal version for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
